Header: Priyasad Depp takes oaths as new Chief Justice
Content: The most senior Supreme Court Judge Priyasad Depp was sworn-in as the 45th Chief Justice of Sri Lanka this morning. The oath taking was held before President Maithripala Sirisena at the presidents official residence this morning. The new Chief Justice functioned as the Government Solicitor General between 2007 and 2011. He served as a Supreme Court Judge until he was recommended for the new position by the Constitutional Council. Chief Justice Priyasad Depp is an old boy of St. Joseph College, Colombo.
